Class FileManagerTest

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class FileManagerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test of the FileManager class

      static void setUpBeforeClass() 
      static void tearDownAfterClass() 
      void testAdd()
      Test add a "e" Model object to the FileManager and control if this really causes the insertion of "e".
      void testGetArraySize()
      Test a function that returns the number of models in the fileType table
      void testGetClicked()
      Will be returned an ArrayList containing all the models of the type indicated that have been clicked by the user The function returns null if no Models are checked, otherwise an an ArrayList.
      void testGetElement()
      Test a method that returns the model of file type "fileType" at index "index".
      void testGetIdByName()
      Test a function that extract the ID of a model named "name" of fileType "fileType" The function returns the (integer) 'ID' of the record 'name'; if 'name' is not find it returns -1.
      void testGetIterator()
      Testing a function that returns an iterator to the ArrayList containing the models of fileType "fileType"
      void testRemove()
      The function under test removes ,thanks to the key value (Model), a Model object from the ArrayList containing the models which share the same parameter's fileType.
      void testRemoveFileTypeInt()
      The function under test removes a Model object from an ArrayList> giving as keys "fileType" and "index" .
      void testRemoveStringFileType()
      Test a remove function with parameters String "name" and FileType "fileType" A record will be removed; filemanager.getArraySize(fileType) returns a minor integer
      void testSetClicked()
      Testing a function that changes the clicked state of the model of file type "fileType" to the boolean value "val".
      void testUpdateClicked()
      The function updates the "clicked" state of a record in the FileManager.

      • testSetClicked

        public final void testSetClicked()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Testing a function that changes the clicked state of the model of file type "fileType" to the boolean value "val". Invoking setChecked on a record, will increase the number of clicked models and getClicked will return a notNull value. If SetChecked is invoked on an index greater than the number of records present in FileManager nothing will be done.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testGetClicked

        public final void testGetClicked()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Will be returned an ArrayList containing all the models of the type indicated that have been clicked by the user The function returns null if no Models are checked, otherwise an an ArrayList.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testAdd

        public final void testAdd()
        Test add a "e" Model object to the FileManager and control if this really causes the insertion of "e".

      • testRemove

        public final void testRemove()
        The function under test removes ,thanks to the key value (Model), a Model object from the ArrayList containing the models which share the same parameter's fileType.

      • testRemoveFileTypeInt

        public final void testRemoveFileTypeInt()
        The function under test removes a Model object from an ArrayList> giving as keys "fileType" and "index" . After removing the record, the array will be smaller and filemanager.getArraySize(fileType) will return a minor integer; if the operation of removing fails because the value of "index" too high, array will be not modified.

      • testGetIterator

        public final void testGetIterator()
        Testing a function that returns an iterator to the ArrayList containing the models of fileType "fileType"

      • testGetArraySize

        public final void testGetArraySize()
        Test a function that returns the number of models in the fileType table

      • testGetElement

        public final void testGetElement()
        Test a method that returns the model of file type "fileType" at index "index". Will be returned the selected Model, if the index is > to the size of the array containing the models, no Model will be returned, but a null value.

      • testRemoveStringFileType

        public final void testRemoveStringFileType()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Test a remove function with parameters String "name" and FileType "fileType" A record will be removed; filemanager.getArraySize(fileType) returns a minor integer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testUpdateClicked

        public final void testUpdateClicked()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The function updates the "clicked" state of a record in the FileManager. Updating the clicked state will modify getClickedModels(fileType).size() and checked record will be present in return value of getClickedModels(fileType).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testGetIdByName

        public final void testGetIdByName()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Test a function that extract the ID of a model named "name" of fileType "fileType" The function returns the (integer) 'ID' of the record 'name'; if 'name' is not find it returns -1.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
